record.field: Notification for Auction {{(object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name or '')}} is activated.

div.div:
Hey !
you have just subscribed the notification for an auction, we will update you about the progress on regular basis .

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Notification for Auction {{(object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name or '')}} is now set to Inactive.

div.div:
Hey !
you have just deactivated the notification for an auction.

footer.p: Click here for subscribe the notification.

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding is going to start very soon.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Bidding for Product will Active Till ??
Bidding for {{(object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name or '')}} will active till {{object.wk_auction_fk.email_get_auction_end_date()}}

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding is now active for this auction.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

div.div:
Hey !
Bidding duration is extended for few more time.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: Auction for {{(object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name or '')}} has been closed

div.div:
Hey ! {{object.partner_id.name or ''}}
Sorry ,Auction has been closed.

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: It's time to know the winner of {{object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name}} auction

div.div:
Hey !
The Auction Has been finish .

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.

record.field: A New Bid Has Been Placed For {{object.wk_auction_fk.product_tmpl_id.name}} ! Hurry

nav.div: A new bid has been placed

div.div:
Hey !
A new bid has been Placed .

footer.p: Click here for unsubscribe the notification.
